search_query: Art Gallery of Sudbury ON museum
extract: The Art Gallery of Sudbury (AGS) is a public art gallery in Greater Sudbury, Ontario, Canada. Established by Laurentian University as the Laurentian University Museum and Art Centre (LUMAC) in 1967, the gallery was located in the historic Belrock Mansion until 2025. It is currently operated from a temporary location on Elgin Street in downtown Sudbury until the new gallery at the Cultural Hub within Tom Davies Square is completed by the end of 2026.
